name: VoiceoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, open Voice of the Day”
”Play the clip again”
”What was yesterday's answer”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content. This skill can extend the  mic timeout.
Invocation Name: voice of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Can you put a name to the voice in this daily trivia challenge?

Every day we will play you a different voice clip of a well known person or celebrity, this could vary from an actor, musician, politician and more! 
All you have to do is guess the name behind the voice you hear in each clip. 
You can make as many guesses as you like, and if you can't get them, then just come back the next day to find out the answer! 

Here are some things you can say!
--------------------------------------
"Alexa, open voice of the day" 
"Play the clip again"
"What was yesterday's answer?"
"Help"
--------------------------------------

⭐Yak Yak Games⭐

Voice of the Day is part of Yak Yak Games, which is a hub of the best voice gaming experiences, this ever expanding extravaganza currently includes: Deal or No Deal, Voice Blast, Yak Yak Quiz, Jeff Stelling's Sports Quiz, What Came First?, The Million Dollar Money Drop, Linkee, Trivia Blast, Song Blast & deep breath... Fart That Tune!

To get started, simply say: "Alexa, open Voice of the Day".

Got a question or suggestion? Drop an email to play@yakyakgames.com
